articles.title: Olivia Rodrigo slams DHS's use of her song 'to promote your racist, hateful propaganda'
articles.full_text: “Don't ever use my songs to promote your racist, hateful propaganda,” Rodrigo replied in the comments on the Instagram post. The video, which DHS and ...
